name.namePart: National Trust for Historic Preservation in the United States

originInfo.publisher: National Trust for Historic Preservation, March-April 1965

mods.note: Includes articles: Sherwood, Brinton. 'Lyndhurst: A Reconciliation 1838-1965; Burnham, Alan. Lyndhurst and the Gothic Revival; Davies, Jane B. 'Alexander J. Davis, Architect of Lyndhurst'; Pearce, John. 'Changing Taste and the Evolution of the Furnishing of Lyndhurst'. Bullock, Helen Duprey. 'Paulding's Manor or Paulding's Folly: The 1838-64 Era of Lyndhurst'; Morton, Terry Brust. 'Merritt's Folly - At 635 South Broadway'; Reed, Henry Hope, Jr. ' Life at Lyndhurst: The Goulds'.
